parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Severe rust and corrosion on the vehicle's frame can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents and injuries. In some cases, it can also affect the steering linkage, making the vehicle unsafe to drive.
symptoms: Rust and corrosion on the frame
especially around the steering box and stabilizer bar
can cause components to break or fall off
leading to loss of control and accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a proper drain tube to route moisture away from the frame can cause water to accumulate and lead to rust and corrosion, affecting the vehicle's structural integrity and safety.
symptoms: Water accumulation around the frame
rust and corrosion on the frame and surrounding components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A broken windshield seal can cause water to leak into the vehicle, leading to electrical and mechanical issues, and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Water leakage into the vehicle
electrical and mechanical issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Safety Concerns with Side Impact Protection
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the vehicle's conversion with large bay windows may not provide adequate protection for passengers in the event of a side impact accident, potentially leading to fatalities.
symptoms: None reported
as this is a concern rather than an incident.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS Module Failure Leading to Underhood Fires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause underhood fires, which can lead to vehicle damage, injury, or even fatalities. These fires can occur while the vehicle is parked, increasing the risk of damage to surrounding property and other vehicles.
symptoms: Underhood fires originating in the ABS module area
burning of the ABS module and wiring connector
damage to the truck battery and other underhood components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake pedal is depressed but only the front brakes function
the brake warning light illuminates intermittently
the vehicle is unable to stop properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake line can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake line rubs on the chassis and eventually ruptures under hard stopping conditions
causing the brakes to fail.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the floor and pedal layout can cause the driver's foot to cover both the brake and accelerator pedals, leading to unintended acceleration and loss of control.
symptoms: The driver's foot covers both the brake and accelerator pedals
causing the vehicle to accelerate instead of brake
leading to accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the rotors and bearings can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The rotors and bearings need to be replaced prematurely
causing the brakes to malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Frame Rust and Steering Mechanism Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rusting of the frame and subsequent failure of the steering mechanism can cause a complete loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle loses complete steerability
the steering mechanism separates
the vehicle is difficult to control
the vehicle wanders or sways while driving
the rear end of the vehicle sways constantly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front ball bearings can cause damage to the hub spindles, leading to loss of vehicle control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Squeaking noise when going over bumps
front end shaking or vibrating
difficulty steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rubber mounts between the frame and body can cause excessive noise, vibration, and potentially lead to structural damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Squeaking noise when going over bumps
excessive vibration
uneven ride.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the internal seals in the transmission can cause the transmission to slip, leading to loss of power and potential accidents.
symptoms: Transmission slipping
hesitation when shifting gears
unusual noise or vibration from the transmission.
